metadata.report_title: chromelevator.exe - Browser Credential Extraction Tool IOC Feed

sha256.notes: Browser credential extraction tool from Arsenal-237 campaign

suspicious_filenames.name: chromelevator.exe
suspicious_filenames.detection_note: Block execution of this file by hash and filename

suspicious_filenames.name: PAYLOAD_DLL
suspicious_filenames.detection_note: Reflective DLL payload embedded in chromelevator.exe resource section

suspicious_locations.detection_note: Malware often executed from temporary directories
Alternative execution location for persistence-less operation

named_pipes.name: \\.*\pipe\*
named_pipes.detection_note: Dynamic named pipe names used for C2 communication with injected payload. Pattern: CreateNamedPipeW with dynamic identifiers
named_pipes.detection_method: Monitor for named pipe creation by chromelevator.exe; establish baseline for normal pipe usage

network_indicators.c2_notes: No direct network C2 observed; communication occurs via named pipes to injected payloads. Data exfiltration likely handled by other Arsenal-237 components (enc_c2.exe)

registry_keys.notes: Queried to locate Chrome installation directory
registry_keys.detection_note: Monitor for unusual registry queries by suspicious processes

registry_keys.notes: Queried to locate Brave Browser installation directory
Queried to locate Microsoft Edge installation directory

file_paths.notes: Chrome password store (SQLite encrypted with DPAPI)
Chrome session cookies and authentication tokens
Chrome autofill, payment cards, and form data
chromelevator.exe enumerates and extracts from all Chrome profiles (Profile 1, Profile 2, etc.)

process_behavior.method: Reflective DLL injection via direct syscalls
process_behavior.detection_note: Monitor for suspicious memory allocation, protection changes, and thread creation in browser processes

process_behavior.behavior: Direct syscall usage bypassing Windows API
process_behavior.detection_note: Modern EDR with syscall tracing (ETW) can detect direct syscall patterns

process_behavior.behavior: Registry enumeration for browser installation paths
process_behavior.detection_note: Unusual registry queries by non-system processes should trigger alerts

behavioral_indicators.behavior: Named pipe server creation by suspicious process
behavioral_indicators.detection: Monitor process creation events for chromelevator.exe; alert on named pipe creation by non-system processes

behavioral_indicators.behavior: Chrome database access by non-browser process
behavioral_indicators.detection: Alert on non-browser processes accessing Chrome/Brave/Edge credential databases
EDR memory scanning and injection detection; syscall tracing for direct syscall injection attempts

behavioral_indicators.indicator: PAYLOAD_DLL resource access and PE header parsing
behavioral_indicators.detection: Monitor for suspicious resource access patterns; check for embedded malicious payloads in PE files

behavioral_indicators.behavior: Large data read from browser credential databases
behavioral_indicators.indicator: Bulk read operations from SQLite databases containing credentials
behavioral_indicators.detection: Monitor for unusual database read operations by browser processes; alert on credential database access

api_calls.detection_note: Direct syscall usage bypasses these API hooks; syscall tracing required for detection

command_line_indicators.detection_note: Specify custom directory for extracted credential output; unusual output paths (D:\, E:\) suggest intentional deployment

mitre_attack_mapping.name: Credentials from Web Browsers
mitre_attack_mapping.evidence: Targeted extraction of cookies, passwords, and payment data from Chrome/Brave/Edge

mitre_attack_mapping.name: Process Injection - Dynamic-link Library Injection
mitre_attack_mapping.evidence: Reflective DLL injection into browser processes

mitre_attack_mapping.name: Debugger Evasion
mitre_attack_mapping.evidence: Analysis environment detection and behavior modification

mitre_attack_mapping.name: Obfuscated Files or Information
mitre_attack_mapping.evidence: Memory encryption of syscall stubs and embedded payloads

mitre_attack_mapping.name: Data from Local System
mitre_attack_mapping.evidence: Extraction of browser SQLite databases and credential stores

mitre_attack_mapping.name: File and Directory Discovery
mitre_attack_mapping.evidence: Browser installation detection and profile enumeration

mitre_attack_mapping.name: Application Layer Protocol - Web Protocols
mitre_attack_mapping.evidence: Named pipe C2 communication with injected payloads

mitre_attack_mapping.name: Command and Scripting Interpreter - Windows Command Shell
mitre_attack_mapping.evidence: Command-line interface with multiple operational modes

detection_rules.description: Detection of chromelevator.exe browser credential extraction tool
Detects execution of chromelevator.exe with suspicious command-line arguments
Detects named pipe creation patterns associated with reflective DLL injection
Detects VirtualAllocEx + WriteProcessMemory + VirtualProtectEx + CreateRemoteThread injection pattern
Detects reflective DLL injection through memory scanning and PE header validation in process memory

campaign_context.attack_chain: Privilege Escalation → Credential Harvesting → Defense Evasion → Ransomware Deployment
campaign_context.confidence: MODERATE (75% - Technical patterns consistent; direct infrastructure correlation required)

immediate_actions: Preserve forensic evidence (memory dumps, disk images)
Force credential rotation for potentially compromised accounts
Alert incident response, CISO, legal, and executive leadership
detection_deployment: Deploy YARA rules for signature-based detection
Implement Sigma rules for process monitoring
Configure EDR for syscall tracing and memory scanning
Enable named pipe monitoring and alerting
Monitor browser credential database access patterns
system_hardening: Implement application control to block unsigned executables
Deploy Windows Credential Guard for credential protection
Enable EDR with advanced memory scanning capabilities
Implement browser security policies and isolation technologies
Segment networks to isolate critical systems
